v.v: How fortunate are those who do not do what the wicked people advise them to do,
Instead, those with whom Yahweh is pleased delight in understanding what he teaches us.
They constantly do things that please God,
But wicked people are not like that!
Therefore, when God judges all mankind, he will condemn the wicked.
For Yahweh guides and protects righteous people,

v: who do not imitate the behavior of sinful people,
and who do not join with people who ridicule God.
They read and think every day and every night about what Yahweh teaches.
just as fruit trees that have been planted along the banks of a stream produce fruit at the right time every year.
they succeed in everything that they do.
Wicked people are as worthless as chaff
that is blown away by the wind.
Furthermore, the wicked will not be present when Yahweh gathers all the righteous people together.
but the path that the wicked walk on leads them to where God will destroy them forever.
